column2: "<%me>... I know what's on your mind."
"You're thinking of going back to 10 years ago, and everything will be clear, am I right?"
"The thought has crossed my mind as well. But, I'm afraid it's not possible."
"Any attempts at intervening in the timelines after the Second's disappearance are rejected. This is likely Xion's work."
"Memories wiped, intervention prohibited. Seriously, she's such a slave driver."
"At any rate, it seems like there's some people that still remember. They might know something."
"So this is the reason why they tried to cover up the existence of Second Generation."
"She nearly turned into a new [Profound Darkness]. Xion's own creation. Second Generation..."
"The knowledge that she imparted caused the Photoners to start toying with life. That is the bitter legacy, the [Profound Darkness]."
"It was to erase that mistake that Xion created Second Generation... And she nearly became the [Profound Darkness] as well."
"Then she should have restarted instead of creating Second Generation... but, Xion could not do it."
"For Second Generation... that would be, toying with her life."
"I had thought that Xion's apologies and regrets were about her imparting knowledge to the Photoners."
"But that was wrong. She was apologizing to Second Generation. She was repenting for her own actions."
"In a way, Second Generation is like a daughter to Xion. It must have been very hard for her."
"That's why I want to save Second Generation, no matter what And had to depend on you for help..."
"I learned a lot by returning to the past. No, to be honest, there are many things I still don't know."
"I won't be going back to the past again. So from here on, I think I'll collect and connect fragments of memory, and search for the truth."
